page.title: 04EDUCATION,ORGANISATION
page.content:
There are only {33 pupils,}aged from 5 to 11, at Knowl Hill Primary School in July 1985 -16 Juniors, 17 Infants.
The Headmistress, Mrs.J.A.Broome, was appointed to the school in 1981. There are two other teachers.Mrs. M. Reid, who has been at the school for 12 years, and Mrs. G. Willis, who teaches part time and who has been at the school just one year.
Mrs. J. Packer, who came to the school as a girl and who trained at Maidenhead College of Art, comes voluntarily twice or three times each week to teach Art .
Parents come willingly to help with Craft, Games, Reading and tidying up. They all help by raising extra funds for the school.
